title: 6 Simple Ways to Search ChatGPT Conversations and History

steps.title: Open the ChatGPT mobile app.
steps.content: Open the ChatGPT mobile app. The official ChatGPT app has a built-in search feature. It's available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . [1] X Research source If you aren't already logged in, enter your account information to do so now.

steps.title: Tap the two horizontal lines icon.
steps.content: Tap the two horizontal lines icon. This is at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Select a chat.
steps.content: Select a chat. You'll see a list of recent chats in the left panel. If you want to search for an older chat, skip this step.

steps.title: Enter your search into the search field.
steps.content: Enter your search into the search field. ChatGPT will begin searching your past conversations for the provided words.

steps.title: Download the Echoes extension on Google Chrome.
steps.content: Download the Echoes extension on Google Chrome. Echoes - ChatGPT Conversation History Search is available only for the Google Chrome browser. To add an extension , do the following: Visit the Echoes download page . Click Add to Chrome at the top. Click Add extension to confirm.

steps.title: Go to https://chat.openai.com.
steps.content: Go to https://chat.openai.com . If you aren't logged in, enter your account information to do so now.

steps.title: Click the Echoes extension icon.
steps.content: Click the Echoes extension icon. This will be in the top-right corner. If it isn't visible, click the puzzle piece icon to toggle it on.

steps.title: Enter a keyword in the search bar.
steps.content: Enter a keyword in the search bar. Matching results from your ChatGPT conversations will load as you type, along with an at-a-glance summary of each result. Click a search result to open it in a pop-up window. Use the left and right arrows to navigate between newer and older searches. If you want to favorite a search, click the heart icon.

steps.title: Download the Searchable ChatGPT Extension on Google Chrome.
steps.content: Download the Searchable ChatGPT Extension on Google Chrome. Searchable ChatGPT is available only for the Google Chrome browser. To add it as an extension, do the following: Visit the Searchable ChatGPT download page . Click Add to Chrome at the top. Click Add extension to confirm.

steps.title: Go to https://chat.openai.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://chat.openai.com/ . If you aren't already logged in to ChatGPT , enter your account information to do so now. If you have a lot of data, it may take a moment to fully sync with the extension. You can see its progress in the sidebar.

steps.title: Click Search chat history.
steps.content: Click Search chat history . Now that you've added the extension, you'll find this in the left sidebar. You can also open the ChatGPT search tool with the keyboard shortcut: CTRL / CMD + Shift + P .

steps.title: Enter your search into the field.
steps.content: Enter your search into the field. Suggestions from your ChatGPT conversations will appear as you type. Click one to load its results. Or, to search for the entered words exactly, click the box for Exact match . You'll see conversations with the included search words from newest to oldest.

steps.content: Download the GPT Search extension on Google Chrome. GPT Search is also available for Edge and Firefox. To add an extension , do the following: Visit the download page . Click Add to Chrome at the top. Click Add extension to confirm.
